item.description: We were snowed out last month. So, we’re trying again! Join us after work for a super time! It’s a nice way to end the week and to mingle and make new friends. There is no charge. For info, call Gail at 860-582-8229. Sponsored by Singles Social Connections. Directions to 2421 Berlin Turnpike: Berlin Turnpike (Rt. 5/15) becomes Wilbur Cross Highway when heading from Berlin toward Meriden, facility on left opposite Safari Golf.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Happy Hour
